EmailTemplate.description: Auto email sent to dealers when they create a part inquiry
EmailTemplate.name: Auto Confirmation Part Inquiry Case Created
EmailTemplate.subject: Parts Inquiry Case {!Case.CaseNumber} Has Been Created
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for submitting case {!Case.CaseNumber}. This case has been received and someone from the Legend Dealer Care team will respond shortly.
Thank you,
Legend Dealer Care Team
